thread_replies.text:
DECODED: Spread Pricing

What they say: “Pharmacy Benefit Managers negotiate discounts to lower your drug costs.”

What it really means:
PBMs pocket the difference between what they bill your health plan and what they pay the pharmacy — that’s called spread pricing. You pay more,
